metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugin marketplace by Raphjay2406

plugins.name: modulo
plugins.description: Premium frontend design system with 74 skills, 11 commands, and 15 agents for creating 90k-quality websites. Covers UI patterns, e-commerce, payments, CMS, maps, social features, PWA, analytics, multi-tenant, onboarding, print/PDF, design tokens, SEO/GEO, accessibility, i18n, performance, testing, virtual scroll, webhooks, database CRUD, markdown/MDX, blog, admin panels, code editors, 3D/WebGL, kanban, timelines, portfolios, notifications, ratings, and real-time collaboration. Includes agents for auditing, Figma translation, security, TypeScript, and interaction review. Works with Next.js and Astro.

plugins.name: wavy-bavy
plugins.description: Integrate the wavy-bavy library for seamless wave transitions between page sections
